name: Gorilla Super Glue 3g (2 Pack)
description: Attach a thing to another thing, securely, swiftly and permanently. Gorilla Super Glue dries in 10 to 30 seconds and is reinforced with rubber to increase its impact resistance. Includes 2, 3gram tubes in a sealed container, so you can use a small, precise amount without the whole tube drying out.Anti-clog cap has long applicator tip for precise applicationClamp for 10 to 30 seconds, it's ready for light handling after 1 to 5 minutes.Full cure takes 24 hours.Translucent when dry.
